      Depth BtceClientApi.getDepth(Pair pair)
      This method provides information on active warrants pair.
      Map<String,PairInfo> BtceClientApi.getInfo()
      This method provides all the information about currently active pairs, such as the maximum number of digits after the decimal point in the auction, the minimum price, maximum price, minimum quantity purchase / sale, hidden whether the pair and the pair commission.
      Ticker BtceClientApi.getTicker(Pair pair)
      This method provides all the information about bidding on a pair, such as: the highest price, lowest price, average price, trading volume, trading volume in the currency of the last deal, the price of buying and selling.
